title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Designation of
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Designation of 

Verifying Entities for Deactivation of Firearms) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (designation verifying entity deactivation firearms) regulation 2020

title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations -
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations - 

“Director of Ordnance” means the Director of the Ordnance Corps of the 
Permanent Defence Forces; 

“EU Regulation” means Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2015/2403 of 15 December 20151, as amended by Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2018/337 of 5 March 20182; 

“Garda Commissioner” means the Commissioner of the Garda Síochána; 

“officer” means a person who holds a commissioned rank in, and is for 
the time being an officer of, the Ordnance Corps of the Permanent 
Defence Forces. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in these Regulations and also used in 
the EU Regulation has the same meaning in these Regulations as in the EU 
Regulation, other than where the context otherwise requires.
text_norm: 2 (1) regulation - director ordnance mean director ordnance corp permanent defence force eu regulation mean commission implementing regulation (eu) 2015 2403 15 december 20151 amended commission implementing regulation (eu) 2018 337 5 march 20182 garda commissioner mean commissioner garda siochana officer mean person hold commissioned rank time officer ordnance corp permanent defence force (2) word expression used regulation also used eu regulation meaning regulation eu regulation context otherwise requires

title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: 3. These Regulations apply to firearms that are classified in category A, B
text_raw:
3. These Regulations apply to firearms that are classified in category A, B 
or C of Part II of Annex I to Council Directive 91/477/EEC of 18 June 19913, as 
amended by Directive 2008/51/EC of the European Parliament and of the

title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: 4. (1) The Garda Commissioner is designated as a verifying entity in the
text_raw:
4. (1) The Garda Commissioner is designated as a verifying entity in the 
State for the purposes of the EU Regulation in respect of firearms to which these 
Regulations apply other than the firearms referred to in Regulation 5(1). 

(2) The functions of the Garda Commissioner under the EU Regulation may 
be performed through or by any member of the Garda Síochána duly authorised 
in that behalf by the Garda Commissioner.
text_norm: 4 (1) garda commissioner designated verifying entity state purpose eu regulation respect firearm regulation apply firearm referred regulation 5(1) (2) function garda commissioner eu regulation may performed member garda siochana duly authorised behalf garda commissioner

title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: 5. (1) The Director of Ordnance is designated as a verifying entity in the
text_raw:
5. (1) The Director of Ordnance is designated as a verifying entity in the 
State for the purposes of the EU Regulation in respect of the firearms in the 
possession of the Defence Forces to which these Regulations apply. 

(2) The functions of the Director of Ordnance under the EU Regulation may 
be performed through or by any officer duly authorised in that behalf by the 
Director of Ordnance.
text_norm: 5 (1) director ordnance designated verifying entity state purpose eu regulation respect firearm possession defence force regulation apply (2) function director ordnance eu regulation may performed officer duly authorised behalf director ordnance

title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: 6. Where the deactivation of a firearm to which these Regulations apply has
text_raw:
6. Where the deactivation of a firearm to which these Regulations apply has 
been carried out by a person who is authorised to perform the functions referred 
to in Article 4(2) or 5(2) he or she shall not perform the functions concerned in 
relation to the firearm. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 August, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 

Minister for Justice and Equality.
